resources.string:
If you are female, you must:
Be healthy and feeling well
Be at least 17 years old in most states
Be at least 5 ft 5 inch
Weigh at least 150 lbs.

If you are male, you must:
Be healthy and feeling well
Be at least 17 years old in most states
Be at least 5 ft 1 inch 
Weigh at least 130 lbs.

Giving blood saves lives. When you donate blood, you impact not only the patient whose life may depend on your donation, but also all those who depend on that patient. The entire community will benefit from he spirit of generosity.
